title: Best of the Program | Guests: Ken Cuccinelli & Richie McGinniss
description:
Acting DHS Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli discusses deploying the National Guard to Kenosha and how the media’s trying to paint the 17-year-old alleged shooter as a murderer. He also shares what the DHS is doing to help those affected by Hurricane Laura. Daily Caller chief video director Richie McGinniss witnessed the Kenosha shooting from just feet away and joins to tell the story the media is ignoring. Former NFL star and congressional candidate Burgess Owens joins after his powerful RNC speech.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
